LockIn

Privacy Policy

Overview

LockIn is designed with privacy in mind. We collect minimal data and store your focus sessions locally on your device using localStorage.

What We Store Locally

  • Active focus session state
  • Session history (last 100 sessions)
  • Your preferences (brown noise, volume)

This data never leaves your device and is not transmitted to any server.

Authentication (Optional)

If you choose to sign in via Clerk, we receive basic profile information (email, name) to manage your account. We store your subscription plan in Clerk's secure metadata.

Payments

Payment processing is handled entirely by Stripe. We do not store your credit card information. Stripe is PCI compliant.

No Tracking

We do not use analytics, tracking pixels, or third-party cookies. Your focus sessions are private.

Contact

Questions? Contact us at privacy@lockin.app

Last updated: January 2026
